function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate safe distancing within hospital spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of cross-infection and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Ensure a minimum of 2.5 m width for corridors, provide bilateral freeboard, and maintain 1 m minimum intervals for social distancing","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air pressure control, filtration, and purification technologies","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Hospital management, facility managers, infection control teams"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in public spaces and hospitals","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne cross-infection and transmission of communicable infections","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rates, utilize natural ventilation, and employ carbon dioxide tracer-gas techniques for analysis","Technologies":"Natural ventilation, forced ventilation, air changes per hour (ACH), carbon dioxide tracer-gas techniques","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility managers, infection control teams, building designers"},{"Description":"Poor pressurization, filtration, and purification in public spaces","Impact":"High risk of widespread transmission of communicable infections such as coronavirus","Mitigation":"Implement pressurization, filtration, and purification technologies including nanotechnology","Technologies":"Pressurization systems, air filtration, nanotechnology, purification systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility managers, building maintenance teams"}]}
